alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:57AM EDT until June 14 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... Central Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Western York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 600 AM EDT. * At 456 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Walnut Bottom to Pine Grove Furnace to Gettysburg to Emmitsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... York, Hanover, Weigelstown, Gettysburg, Parkville, Shippensburg, Spry, Dallastown, Hampton, Shiloh, East York and West York. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 203 to 204. Interstate 81 from mile markers 27 to 42. Interstate 83 from mile markers 6 to 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
